name: F16 Jet Fighter Air Sky Strike – aircraft missile war simulator
name_original: F16 Jet Fighter Air Sky Strike – aircraft missile war simulator
description:
Welcome to F16 Jet Fighter Air Sky Strike game!
This is one of the best F16 Jet fighter Jet Games in which you can fly F16 fighter aircraft over daunting waves of Pacific Ocean for an extreme war action air combat locate and shoot mission. With F16 Jet fighter game accept the challenge where you will be the only F16 strike fighter controlling F16 aircraft, F16 air missile and enjoy your F16 air strike over the enemies. With the usage of your striking F16 flight simulation tricks you will feel yourself in the place of military high ranked F16 flight fighter pilot in this f16 air fighter game. Air battle against the air gunship battle at its best in the open sky. Play this F16 Army jet Fighter Jet Attack tactical dog fight simulation game and test your air fighting skills.


F16 Jet Fighter Air Sky Strike Game Features:

- amazing flight simulator game & aircraft combat game
- Fun action-packed combat target flight game
- Easy controls using on screen steering
- Great 3D flights missions, take part in various different combat battlefield operations
- Fight against an increasing amount of enemy planes, lock on your target and shoot them out of the air in different flights missions
